pageProps.title: Surviving the Tech Recession: A Guide for College Students
pageProps.metaDesc:
The tech industry is going through a recession, and many big companies have been laying off employees, causing college students and aspiring tech engineers to feel doubtful, scared, and depressed. However, as history shows, bear markets come and go, and the people who end up winning are those who constantly upskill themselves.
This article provides insights, tips, and strategies for aspiring engineers to weather the recession and come out stronger and better.
